import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { faSearch, faBars, faTachometerAlt, faPersonBooth, faUsers, faListAlt, faWarehouse, faTags, faPercent, faChartBar } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons'; import { faProductHunt } from '@fortawesome/free-brands-svg-icons'; import { Nav, Form, FormControl, Button, Spinner, Tab, Row, Col, } from "react-bootstrap" import Vendors from './dashboard-tabs-content/vendors'; import Customers from './dashboard-tabs-content/customers'; import Products from './dashboard-tabs-content/products'; import ProductCategories from './dashboard-tabs-content/product-categories'; import Inventory from './dashboard-tabs-content/inventory'; import Discounts from './dashboard-tabs-content/discount'; import Commision from './dashboard-tabs-content/commision'; import Reports from './dashboard-tabs-content/reports'; import GlobalStyleSheet from '../../../../styleSheet'; export const styles = { background: { background: `${GlobalStyleSheet.admin_primry_color}`, }, // Styles for the dashboard.js search_bar: { width: '75%', flex: '7', border: `2px solid ${GlobalStyleSheet.admin_primry_color}`, margin: '2px 2.5px 1px 1.2px', }, search_btn: { background: `${GlobalStyleSheet.admin_primry_color}`, flex: '1', border: 'none', color: 'white', width: '20%', float: 'right', borderRadius: 'none', }, side_drawer_search_btn: { background: `${GlobalStyleSheet.admin_primry_color}`, margin: '0px 2px', color: 'white', width: '38px', height: '38px', maxHeight: '40px', maxWidth: '40px', border: 'none', }, side_drawer_search_bar: { margin: '2px 0px', flex: '1', }, border: { border: '1px solid white', background: `${GlobalStyleSheet.admin_primry_color}`, color: `${GlobalStyleSheet.body_color}`, borderRadius: '4px' }, link_color: { color: `${GlobalStyleSheet.body_color}`, fontSize: '16px' }, fontawesome: { color: `${GlobalStyleSheet.body_color}`, marginRight: '20px', width: '15px', height: '15px', maxHeight: '15px', maxWidth: '15px', }, row: { padding: '0px', margin: '0px', }, body: { background: `${GlobalStyleSheet.primry_color}`, padding: '0px 7px', }, } const Dashboard = props => (
{/* Toogle Button Components */}
{/* End of the Toogle Button Components */} {/* Tabs Components */}
Dashboard
Vendors
Customers
Products
Categories
Inventory
Discounts
Commision
Reports
{/* End of the Tabs Components */}
) export default Dashboard;
